Package com.intellij.codeInsight.template

Interface TemplateBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TemplateBuilderImpl

    public interface TemplateBuilder
    Shows a live template-like chooser UI over a PSI element and offers the user to replace certain sub-elements of the specified element with values of his/her choice.
    See Also:
    TemplateBuilderFactory

void run()

      • run

        void run(Editor editor,
         boolean inline)
        Shows the live template and initiates editing process.
        Parameters:
        editor - editor to use to start editing process.
        inline - if true then inline template will be created, regular otherwise
